spirituell_massa_text1: Historical Voices will exhibit at the Spiritual Fair on September 6–7!
spirituell_massa_text2: Come and learn more about ghost hunting, share your own paranormal experiences, try out our equipment, and much more.
spirituell_massa_text3: Click the image to read more!
upcoming_paragraph1: Previously, we shared our planned investigations, but unfortunately we have seen this being misused by other actors in the same field.
upcoming_paragraph2: Out of respect for our work and to protect our future projects, we have therefore chosen to no longer publish upcoming locations in advance.
upcoming_paragraph3: But stay tuned – as soon as we have visited and investigated a location, we will publish content here on the website and on our social media.
